channel.title: Contra Costa County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Contra Costa County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 26 - Crockett/Pomona St. The Carqinuez Bridge bridge over the Carquinez Straits begins here. The eastbound direction over the bridge pays tolls. All Fastrak users, use the left lane. Fastrak is a transponder system used to pay tolls in California.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 27
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 27 - Pomona St. After this exit the highway enters the Carquinez Bridge over the Carquinez Straits, which feeds the Sacramento and San Joaquin Rivers into the San Francisco Bay. Use the left lanes for Fastrak, an electronic tolling system used in California.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 23 and 24
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 23 - CA-4 East/Hercules/Stockton. Approaching Exit 24 - Willow Ave. This is the western end of CA-4, which follows the south side of the Carquinez Straits towards Stockton. CA-4 is a trans-Sierra highway, crossing at Ebbetts Pass. I-80 continues east towards Sacramento.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 22 and 23
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 22 - Pinole Valley Road. Approaching Exit 23 - CA-4/Stockton/Hercules.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 21 and 22
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 21 - Appian Way. Approaching Exit 22 - Pinole Valley Road.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 21
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 21 - Appian Way.

item.title: Richmond Parkway East at I-80
item.description: Richmond Parkway East at I-80. Turn right for the I-80 West HOV lanes. Continue ahead for I-80 east towards Sacramento.

item.title: Richmond Parkway East Nearing I-80
item.description: Richmond Parkway East approaching I-80. Use right lane for Sacramento. Use left lane for Oakland.

item.title: I-580 East - Exit 7
item.description: I-580 east approaching Exit 7 - To I-80 East/Richmond Parkway/Point Richmond.
